body:
Plot Twist!

The goal of this game is simple. Just write a scenario, and the person above you will make a plot twist to it or just keep the sentence going and write their own scenario. The goal is just a never ending story and if someone does try to end it "Plot Twist" it keeps going.
  
*Ill start us off: Your walking to school
body_tagged:
Plot Twist!

The goal of this game is simple. Just write a scenario, and the person above you will make a plot twist to it or just keep the sentence going and write their own scenario. The goal is just a never ending story and if someone does try to end it "Plot Twist" it keeps going.
  
*Ill start us off: Your walking to school
title: [Game] Plot Twist!

replies.body: and a limo drives by to take you the rest of the way.
replies.body_tagged: and a limo drives by to take you the rest of the way.

replies.body: But it's not actually a limo driver driving said limo, it's John Muccacio.
replies.body_tagged: But it's not actually a limo driver driving said limo, it's John Muccacio.

replies.body: But the Limo wasn't a limo. It was a Food truck
replies.body_tagged: But the Limo wasn't a limo. It was a Food truck

replies.body: Soon after Kanye West starts working at the food truck
replies.body_tagged: Soon after Kanye West starts working at the food truck

replies.body: But Kayne West is actually working for the NSA

replies.body: NSA doesn't exist, he actually works at McDonalds!
